comments.body: is the intent to default this to true to match current behavior, pick that change back to 1.17/1.18, then flip the default to false for 1.20+? I thought we wanted this to default to false in 1.20+

Yes, I think so.

jsafrane above mentioned default-false would break some of his test setups, no-one was sure about real users. Out of an abundance of caution then we decided to keep it opt-in until we get something more definite.

I'm happy to hear another opinion, especially if it's more decisive!
